page.title: 10EASTHORPE & MESSING.
page.content: In our D_block most people said that a Bistro has opened as well as a nursery school which is supposed to be very good. Another thing that has opened is a new village hall. Although these three buildings are not in our D_block, they have obviously affected the people in the village.The Saxons founded Easthorpe.The Roman road was an escape route from Colchester. Then the Danes came and renamed it Easthorpe.The prefabricated council houses were only supposed to stay up for 10 years,but they are still standing 40 years later. In Easthorpe we talked to the owner of Easthorpe Hall who said the houses have changed in Easthorpe.Most people said that there were more houses and that the pub was a shop.The pub is known as The House Without a Name,as they couldn't think of a name for it.
